ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) jar salsa (such as Newman's Own® medium or hot)
2 cups shredded Mexican-style cheese blend, or more to taste

cookingTips: Warm refried beans and taco seasoning before layering for easier spreading
Layer in order: beans, sour cream, salsa, cheese for best presentation and flavors
Serve with tortilla chips at room temperature or warm in 350°F oven for 15 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why layer in this specific order? Should the dip be served warm or cold?
